column1: USR_FDX_ALERT3,"","Aritzia Parcel Manifest Alert SAT",0,"cron","list warehouses
[select case when charindex(' DEV ', @value) > 0 then ' BY DEV '
when charindex(' TST ', @value) > 0 then ' BY QA '
where subject = ' Parcel Manifest Not Closed: '
and message = ' Parcel Manifest Left Open Please close parcel manifest(s) '
column5: ' before 11:30PM PST. This alert is active from 7:30PM PST to 8:00PM PST

column1: and will execute every 15 minutes during this window.' catch(@?)
